title: Pa!ette: just mix it
team: Myeongseong Kim, Suhyeon Ryu, Seokhyung Bae
summary: A color explorer plug-in based on real paint mixing experience.
It was developed inspired by memories of childhood painting class.

paragraph: A color has four dimensions, including RGB and alpha(transparency).
Since it has a high degree of freedom, it is not easy for non-experts to choose the desired color without trial and error.
It was developed inspired by memories of childhood painting class.
The course project from [Interactive Software Design - Fall 2021, instructor: Prof. Seokhyung Bae]
